verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] soon be signing a bill that will expand private care for veterans as an alternative to the troubled Veterans Affairs health system .
President Donald Trump will soon [V: be] signing a bill that will expand private care for veterans as an alternative to the troubled Veterans Affairs health system .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-TMP: soon] be [V: signing] [ARG1: a bill that will expand private care for veterans as an alternative to the troubled Veterans Affairs health system] .
President Donald Trump will soon be signing a bill that [V: will] expand private care for veterans as an alternative to the troubled Veterans Affairs health system .

President Donald Trump will soon be signing [ARG0: a bill] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: expand] [ARG1: private care for veterans] [ARGM-PRD: as an alternative to the troubled Veterans Affairs health system] .
